abstract.para: SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP applications is optimized in various ways for SAP* applications.

This document explains how to deploy a high availability cluster solution using SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP applications 12 for the Enqueue Replication scenario on the AWS platform. The goal is to match the SAP NW- HA-CLU 7.40 certification specifications and goals. This document is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP applications 12 SP3. The concept however can also be used with newer service packs of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP applications.
